item.title: NTHU Presidential Hsing Chien Award
item.description: Introduction Presidential Hsing Chien Award is presented by National Tsing Hua University to recognize student outstanding achievements in extracurricular activities. Certificate Recommendation Letter Link http://dsa.site.nthu.edu.tw/p/404-1266-196514.php?Lang=zh-tw
